title: Wednesday Post Show (11-3-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (11-3-21)
description:
Bobby starts by rolling through some voicemails addressing some concerns they have from the show. We address a complaint we get about having ‘too many commercials. Bobby shares two crazy stories: a dad fends off robbers posed as trick or treaters…and a dad who killed his daughter's 19-year-old boyfriend for selling her into a sex trafficking ring. We also get into a debate about Daylight Savings time and how Facebook is getting rid of facial recognition technology. Bobby also talks about how he doesn’t think he’d push his kids to play football.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby starts by rolling through some voicemails addressing some concerns they have from the show. We address a complaint we get about having ‘too many commercials. Bobby shares two crazy stories: a dad fends off robbers posed as trick or treaters…and a dad who killed his daughter's 19-year-old boyfriend for selling her into a sex trafficking ring. We also get into a debate about Daylight Savings time and how Facebook is getting rid of facial recognition technology. Bobby also talks about how he doesn’t think he’d push his kids to play football.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
